text: Gitra Yuda Furton (born 7 April 1993) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Liga 1 club Arema.Gitra Yuda Furton ligaindonesia ==Career== ===Semen Padang=== Gitra Yuda is a Semen Padang U-21 player and moreover, he managed to bring Semen Padang U-21 won in the Indonesia Super League U-21 for the first time in this year after defeating Sriwijaya FC U-21.Semen Padang U-21 juara Indonesia Super League U-21 2014 In 2015, he joined the senior squad of Semen Padang F.C. in 2015 Indonesia Super League, wearing jersey number 5.Semen Padang Launching Tim untuk Hadapi ISL 2015 ===PS TNI=== Gitra joined PS TNI for the 2016 Indonesia Soccer Championship A.Tak ada legiun asing, berikut skuat PS TNI di ajang ISC A 2016 == Honours == ===Club=== ;Semen Padang U-21 * Indonesia Super League U-21: 2014 ==References== ==External links== * * Gitra Yuda Furton goal.com * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Padang Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Semen Padang F.C. players Category:PS TIRA players Category:Persik Kediri players Category:Liga 2 (Indonesia) players
title: Gitra Yuda Furton
